TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpAsyncHandler implements class System.Web.IHttpHandler

summary.span: 定义 HTTP 异步处理程序对象必须实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that HTTP asynchronous handler objects must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以在配置节中通过配置文件与文件扩展名或特定 URL 相关联 `httpHandlers` 。An class can be associated with a file name extension or a particular URL by a configuration file, in the `httpHandlers` configuration section. 然后，ASP.NET 基础结构将实例化并在收到相应的请求时调用该处理程序。The ASP.NET infrastructure will then instantiate and call the handler when the corresponding request is received. 或者，可以在 foo.ashx 文件中定义该处理程序，并在收到 foo.ashx 文件的相应请求时，将执行该处理程序。Alternatively, the handler can be defined in an .ashx file and when the corresponding request is received for the .ashx file the handler will be executed.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginProcessRequest (System.Web.HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, object extraData);

summary.span: 启动对 HTTP 处理程序的异步调用。

span.span: Initiates an asynchronous call to the HTTP handler.

returns.span: 包含有关进程状态信息的 。

summary.span: 进程结束时提供异步处理 End 方法。

span.span: Provides an asynchronous process End method when the process ends.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来引发在异步过程中捕获的任何异常。You can use to raise any exceptions caught during the asynchronous process.
